infobox.Japanese title:: 堤無津川凧揚げ事件  (Teimuzu-gawa Tako-age Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Hiroshi Agasa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Ryusuke Higo  Takahiro Sanada  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Yoko Okino  Kaitou Kid
infobox.Animation director:: 765 Seiji Muta (supervisor), Michitaka Yamamoto, Juri Saito  766 Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (supervisors), Nobuyuki Iwai
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Miki Nagasawa as Yoko Okino  Takahiro Sakurai as Ryusuke Higo  Hiroyuki Yoshino as Takahiro Sanada  Hiroki Takahashi as Ryōta Renno  Yumi Hikita as Takami Renno  Hidenari Ugaki as Yuitoshi Kakura  Toshiharu Sakurai as Takeshi Yatsukoshi  Yuji Okamura as Attendant  Youhei Osa as Organizer  Atsushi Kisaichi as Interviewer

sections.Situation: The Detective Boys headed to the Teimuzu River to try to win a kite flying event. During the kite flying event, a man on the neighboring team fell into the Teimuzu river. After examining the scene a bit, Conan became sure it is no accident.
sections.People:
- Victim (drowned - injured)
- 39 years old
- Kite competitor
- Café owner
- 35 years old
- Ryōta's wife
- 41 years old
- Kite competitor
- Yuitoshi's younger sister
- Unconscious and in serious condition in a hospital
- 34 years old
- Kite competitor
- Café employee
